# Analysis

Given a list of concepts, with an effort and impact score, demonstrate the difference

## Step 1: Import

Import concepts

```{r load data}
concepts <- read.csv("data/concepts.csv")
```

## Step 2: Verify data

```{r look at data}
head(concepts)
```

```{r look at column names}
colnames(concepts)
```

## Step 3: Install and load the 'ggplot2' package

```{r loading and installing ggplot2, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
install.packages('ggplot2')
library(ggplot2)
```

## Step 4: Making a Scatter Plot

```{r}
ggplot(concepts, aes(x = Effort, y = Impact, label = Concept, color = Concept)) + 
  geom_point() +
  geom_text(hjust=-0.05, vjust=0, size=3) + 
  expand_limits(x = c(0, 70), y = c(0, 70)) + 
  xlab("Effort (0 - Difficult, 70 - Easier)") +
  ylab("Impact (0 - Low, 70 - High)") +
  labs(title = "Scatterplot of HBAS Concepts: Effort and Impact", subtitle = "Concepts toward the top right are lower effort, higher impact")

```
